00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECOLUMNIT24BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECOLUMNIT24BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageColumnIterator24bp
00038 {
00043         class CIntermediateType
00044         {
00046                 UINT8** m_ppCurr;
00047                 public:
00049                 inline CIntermediateType(UINT8** ppCurr):m_ppCurr(ppCurr){}
00051                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(const CIntermediateType& Obj){*m_ppCurr=*Obj.m_ppCurr;return *this;}
00057                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(UINT32 Color){**m_ppCurr = (char)Color;*(*m_ppCurr+1)=(char)(Color>>8);*(*m_ppCurr+2)=(char)(Color>>16);return *this;};
00065                 inline operator UINT32(){return (UINT32)(*(UINT32*)(*m_ppCurr) & 0xffffff);}
00067                 inline const UINT32 Get(UINT32 i,UINT16 ByteWidth){return *(UINT32*)(*m_ppCurr-i*ByteWidth) & 0xffffff;}
00068         };
00069 protected: // attributes
00071         const TImage* m_pTImg;
00073     UINT8* m_pCurr;
00075         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00078         CIntermediateType m_IntermediateType;
00079 public:
00086         inline CImageColumnIterator24bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex, const TImage* pTImg);
00088         inline CImageColumnIterator24bp& operator=(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& It);
00091         inline CImageColumnIterator24bp End() const;
00096         inline CImageColumnIterator24bp& operator++() { m_pCurr-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return *this; }
00098         inline CIntermediateType& operator*(){return m_IntermediateType;}
00100         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return m_IntermediateType.Get(i,m_pTImg->ByteWidth);}
00103         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q);
00106         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q);
00109         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q);
00110 };
00111 
00112 inline CImageColumnIterator24bp::CImageColumnIterator24bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex,
00113                                                                                                                         const TImage* pTImg):
00114                 m_pTImg(pTImg), m_pCurr(pTImg->ppAllScanLines[StartIndex]+ColumnIndex*3),
00115                         m_pEnd(m_pCurr-pTImg->ByteWidth*(MaxIndex-StartIndex)), m_IntermediateType(&m_pCurr)
00116 {
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 inline CImageColumnIterator24bp& CImageColumnIterator24bp::operator=(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& It)
00121 {
00122         m_pTImg= It.m_pTImg;
00123         m_pCurr = It.m_pCurr;
00124         m_pEnd  = It.m_pEnd;
00125         m_IntermediateType = It.m_IntermediateType;
00126         return *this;
00127 }
00128 
00129 inline CImageColumnIterator24bp CImageColumnIterator24bp::End() const
00130 {
00131         CImageColumnIterator24bp t = *this;
00132         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00133         return t;
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline bool operator==(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q)
00137 {
00138         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00139 }
00140 
00141 inline bool operator!=(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q)
00142 {
00143         return !(p==q);
00144 }
00145 
00146 inline bool operator<(const CImageColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageColumnIterator24bp& q)
00147 {
00148         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00149 }
00150 
00151 } // end namespace ipl
